Saved Designs
Press to switch between Crafting and Saved Weapon Designs List views.
Save Design
Save the currently designed weapon.
Undo all changes done to current designed weapon.
Edit Design
Edit the currently selected weapon design.
Select a weapon design to edit it.
Delete Design
Delete the currently selected weapon design.
Select a weapon design to delete it.
Toggle off to skip the new crafted weapon popup dialog.
Press this to reset all toggles to their default states.
Toggle on to include Locked Weapons.
Toggle on to include Player Crafted weapons.
Toggle on to include Non-Player Crafted weapons.
Settings (Coming Soon... Maybe)
Toggle on to remove heroes with not enough energy from cycles.
Toggle on to remove heroes that do not have the currently selected recipe from cycles.
Toggle on to include weapons that give at least one
Cycle Hero Forwards
HotKey to cycle forward between different heroes in forge.
Cycle Hero Backwards
HotKey to cycle backward between different heroes in forge.
Left Arrow
Right Arrow
Crafting stamina
Ctrl Refine
The number of refining operations to perform when pressing "Refine" while holding the left Ctrl key. Set to 0 for Maximum.
Shift Refine
The number of refining operations to perform when pressing "Refine" while holding the left Shift key. Set to 0 for Maximum.
Ctrl + Shift Refine
The number of refining operations to perform when pressing "Refine" while holding the left Ctrl + left Shift keys. Set to 0 for Maximum.
Smelt Multiple Key
The key to hold when pressing the "Smelt" Button to perform a Smelt Multiple operation. Smelt Multiple will only smelt the currently selected equipment.
Smelt Multiple Count
The number of smelting operations to perform when pressing "Smelt" while holding the key specified in the "Smelt Multiple" setting. Set to 0 for Maximum.
Smelt All Key
The key to hold when pressing the "Smelt" Button to perform a Smelt All operation. Smelt All will smelt all unlocked equipment starting from the top of the equipment list.
Enable Smart Smelting

If set to true, when doing a "Smelt All" operation, will only smelt either Player Crafted weapons, or Non-Player Crafted weapons, depending on the selected piece of equipment when the button is pressed.
Ctrl Craft
The number of crafting operations to perform when pressing "Craft" while holding the left Ctrl key. Set to 0 for Maximum.
Shift Craft
The number of crafting operations to perform when pressing "Craft" while holding the left Shift key. Set to 0 for Maximum.
Ctrl + Shift Craft
The number of crafting operations to perform when pressing "Craft" while holding the left Ctrl + left Shift keys. Set to 0 for Maximum.
Show Only Unlocked Pieces by Default
If Enabled, toggle button "Show only unlocked pieces" will be enabled by default.
Group Identical Crafted Weapons
If Enabled, will group all identical crafted weapons (Weapons with the same name, same type, same stats, etc) together.
Use Crafting Stamina
Disable this option for unlimited crafting stamina.
Recovery rate inside towns
Crafting stamina recovery rate multipler when party rest inside towns. 100% means the same as vanilla recovery rate in towns; 0% means that recovery inside towns is disabled.
Recovery rate outside towns
Crafting stamina recovery rate multipler when party is outside towns. 100% means the same as vanilla recovery rate in towns; 0% means that recovery outside towns is disabled.
